name: Family X Loyalty - Geri Habano - Pipe Size
additionalNotes: Family By Loyalty is a brand that represents the passion and commitment of cigar enthusiasts. It was created with the aim of providing connoisseurs with an exceptional and refined experience, taking them on a behind-the-scenes journey of crafting their own line of cigars. The brand seeks to captivate the senses and transport aficionados to a world of refined indulgence, showcasing a dedication to quality and the artistry of cigar making.
